oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memphis & Charleston Depot
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: railroads; Memphis & Charleston Railroad; depots; transportation; 1880s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Notes on back: Memphis & Charleston Depot - on Charleston Street in 1880s - (names changed later to Southern, on Lauderdale) - for appearance in 1967 see W. Tenn. Hist. Soc. papers p. 48
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Commercial Appeal
